00102 template<class Element>
00103 istd::IChangeable* TExtMessage<Element>::CloneMe(CompatibilityMode mode) const
00104 {
00105        istd::TDelPtr<TExtMessage<Element> > clonedPtr(new TExtMessage<Element>);
00106        if (clonedPtr->CopyFrom(*this, mode)){
00107               return clonedPtr.PopPtr();
00108        }
00109 
00110        return NULL;
00111 }
